general_info.summary: The provided text is a compilation of links and navigational elements, likely from a university website. It covers various sections such as student and teacher feedback, university authorities and committees, policies, different schools within the university, admission processes, fee structures, scholarships, and placement information. It also includes contact details for admissions and placements, as well as references to specific reports and programs.
